member.name: T:Fake.Testing.Common.TestRunnerErrorLevel.DontFailBuild
member.summary: With this option set, no exception is thrown if a test is broken.

member.name: T:Fake.Testing.Common.TestRunnerErrorLevel.FailOnFirstError
member.summary: This option instructs FAKE to break the build if a test runner finds the first error.

member.name: T:Fake.Testing.Common.TestRunnerErrorLevel.Error
member.summary: This option instructs FAKE to break the build if a test runner reports an error.

member.name: T:Fake.Testing.Common.TestRunnerErrorLevel
member.summary: Option which allows to specify if a test runner error should break the build.
